subject: Memo, here's your forecast for April 16th - April 22nd
body:
Memo, to ensure that your weekly forecasts are delivered correctly to your inbox, please add our email address Rochelle@myhealthwealthandhappiness.com to your address book.
 
                              New Moon, April 17,  7:37 AM EST






               




Dear Memo,

    It's time to focus on new beginnings and the power you have to change your life forever.
    As Henry Thoreau wrote:  "I know of no more encouraging fact than the unquestionable ability of man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor."
    In order to change, the first thing you must do is get yourself unstuck.  Memo, to do this, it is important that you look closely at how you perceive yourself.  Most limitations to success you perceive come from internalizing negative messages from people and past events.  These can easily be overcome.
    This is very important for you to remember -- you do have the power to succeed.  And together, Memo, we are going to grow your awareness and choice-making ability so you can experience abundance in every area of your life.
    Know that the thoughts that empower you to succeed come from your true Self and a Higher Power.  This is why you must first love yourself and embrace the incredible blessings you have been given.  Now more than ever, know that it is not only possible to change your thinking but also your actions.  This steady change will allow your dreams to blossom and be realized.  As Marcus Aurelius said  "The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it."
    So that is why this week I want you to remember to concentrate on:

    1.  Focusing your mind on your best achievements, both big and small, and your ability to succeed.
    2.  Quieting your mind for 15 minutes each day in order to feel the energy flow within you.  This will help get your thoughts moving in the right direction so that you can begin realizing your dreams.
    3.  Choosing one goal and taking your first step towards achieving it.

    Memo, you can't expect to achieve success or move beyond your present situation unless you truly believe in yourself.  Now is the time to use this inner power to change your life.
    I know you can do this and Bethea and I will be there with you, every step of the way.

                      Until next week,                          
P.S. Don’t forget to add Rochelle@myhealthwealthandhappiness.com to your address book.  We want to make sure that you receive your weekly forecasts on time.





                 


    The lovely optimistic New Moon in Aries appears on the 17th and makes a strong link to the power planet, Pluto.  If you've been meaning to start a course or improve your fitness, now is the time to do it, Memo.  Saturn, which has been moving backwards through Leo since early December, heads in the right direction on the 19th.  You could be reminded of unfinished business that day and may have an opportunity to resolve something that has been bothering you.  The Sun enters lovely, earthy Taurus on the 20th and everyone will begin to feel a little more mellow.





Memo                April 16 - April 22                




 



    Memo, I want you to take maximum advantage of the luck coming your way this week. From my calculations, Saturday is going to be your lucky day for this period.  And your Lucky Numbers are 11, 16, 30, 20, 38, 49.  I hope you'll make the best of them.











April 16th for Memo










    I urge you to attend an event of a spiritual or educational nature. An exciting conversation can develop with a young person, possibly an Aquarius, who could offer a new viewpoint.







    Higher studies such as  philosophy, religion and spirtuality are favorable and active.  Disputes could arise due to snap judgments and hasty responses.  Be gentle.










    Institutions of higher education can now provide a backdrop for some pleasant interactions with a wide variety of scholarly types.  You may decide to take up cultural studies or look into travel possibilities.







    Your temper could rear it's head in most dramatic fashion in group situations, so plan for that possibility, and have an escape route mapped out - just in case you say or do 'something.'







    Learning about different cultures can get you thinking about going on a trip.  Surf the Internet or search the newspapers for good rates on air fares.  You might find a fabulous bargain.











April 17th for Memo
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
    When we stop experiencing new ideas, we stop growing.  I see the prospect for a major "growth spurt."  Just because you have never tried something before, doesn't mean it's not for you.


 
 

 
 
    Do you feel that your closest acquaintances are missing the point?  If you feel the need to correct them, be gentle -- not like the proverbial "bull in a china shop."


  
 
 
    This is a fine time for travel planning or anything related to schools, churches, cultural groups or community organizations.  You think forward now and follow things through.

 
 

 
 




    You're ready for an adventure.  If you spot a terrific bargain on an air fare or travel accommodation, snap it up immediately.  This will give you more money to spend on luxuries.
 
 
  








April 18th for Memo

 
 
 


 
 
    I sense that you might be a very good teacher, but you don't realize it. Why not spend time with young people?  You could share stories or help them with homework. It can be stimulating.


 

 
 
    Friends are an important part of your day and are likely to involve you in physical activities or improvement projects of some sort.  My dear, your money schemes have merit and those in power could aid.

 
 
 
 




    Your organizational affiliations outside of the home may bring some interesting opportunities your way today.  Dear one, a close friend may also present you with some startling news at this time.   

 



    Where an important friendship is concerned, remember that today's denial could bring tomorrow's acceptance.  Nothing is lost, but rather you could be in the middle of a transformation.  Ride the tide, dear.
 

 
 


    Keep an open mind where new people in your life are concerned. Although certain characters may not seem to have a lot in common with you on the surface, you may be surprised later on.
 







April 19th for Memo
  
 

 
 
 
    An unexpected meeting with old acquaintance could prove to be fascinating.  However, I suggest that you watch the time so you can get home at a reasonable hour.





 
 
    I sense that you want to be with friends today, but they may want to be alone.  Please don't take this personally -- it isn't anything you did.  Give them some time; things will soon be normal.


 

 
 
    Friends and close associates are likely to draw you into involvements with groups, clubs or organizations now.  You may enter into a business relationship with someone in a high position.  Keep focused.

 
 
 








April 20th for Memo
  
 
 
 
 
 
    Fun-loving acquaintances could try to persuade you to spend money that you don't have.  You might want to be sure that your everyday expenses are covered before doing something foolish.


 

 
 
    A restless or preoccupied friend may not make the best companion today.  Avoid overwork and physical strain now, yourself, dear one. Instead, put your energies into proven methods and routine duties.


 


 
 
    A friendship may be put to the test during this time.  Make sure that your loyalty is understood and appreciated.  Some relationships actually get stronger when put under pressure.

 


 





    Domestic and business affairs alike can bring intellectual stimulation and boost your interest in a previous project or short-range development.  Friends and individuals in power offer you support.    

 
 


    Elders value time you spend with them this day.  You may volunteer to help the underprivileged or offer a worthy donation of clothes, furniture or money to a charity organization. 
  

 
 


    Generally, you are open to new ideas, but today, a friend's ideas may just hit you wrong.  Moods are touchy now, to say the least, and you will need to pick and choose your confrontations.  Stay goal oriented.
 







April 21st for Memo
  
 
 
 

 
 
    You might consider joining a new club or revisiting one that you've been neglecting.  Today's stars point to groups that feature fine dining, painting, or genealogy.  Take your pick.


 
 

 
 
    There is the likelihood that you could dream of a woman you haven't seen in a while.  If she used to give you advice, you will want to pay attention to what your dream is saying to you.

 


 
 




    A lighthearted mood may prevail today.  Be sure to set aside a few hours to work on a creative project.  Spending time on such a pleasurable activity will sustain your happy spirits.   

 
 


    A behind-the-scenes power struggle can be causing you stress.  Do yourself a favor and get some light exercise.  This will make it easier to relax, even during tense situations.
 
 

 


    You are capable of some amazing flashes of intuition.  Your sensitivity and desire to nurture makes you a natural at offering aid to those in need.  Today, you will find ways to serve others.








April 22nd for Memo
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
    Things look to be rather stressful in your home at this time.  If you are having trouble unwinding, I suggest that you explore herbal remedies such as chamomile tea or a lavender bath.


  

 
 
    Harmonious emotions and mental stability grace your day, allowing you to put certain aspects of your past into proper perspective.  This is a time for moving forward with your life.  Follow your dreams.


  

 
 
    Your sensitivity to the world is your greatest asset now.  Don't let others make you afraid to take chances or travel to unknown realms. Your instincts are right on.

 

 








    Next week, Memo, you could find yourself a bit impulsive, both creatively and personally.

                       Best Regards, 
                        




    If at any time you no longer wish to receive your weekly forecast, you can simply click here or send a letter to me at 167 Cherry St. PMB 292, Milford, CT 06460-3400, and I will stop emailing them to you. It's as simple as that. My only desire is to help you, Memo.
